law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 340, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 284, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 72, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (2), (11) and (21). -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1952.
